text: قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ لِمَ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبْلَ ٱلْحَسَنَةِ ۖ لَوْلَا تَسْتَغْفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ

translation.en.sahih: He said, "O my people, why are you impatient for evil instead of good? Why do you not seek forgiveness of Allah that you may receive mercy?"
translation.id.indonesian: Dia berkata: "Hai kaumku mengapa kamu minta disegerakan keburukan sebelum (kamu minta) kebaikan? Hendaklah kamu meminta ampun kepada Allah, agar kamu mendapat rahmat".
